required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Alprostadil Liposomes for Injection for Lower Extremity Arteriosclerosis Obliteran
clinical_study.official_title: Alprostadil Liposomes for Injection for Lower Extremity Arteriosclerosis Obliteran of Phase II Clinical Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, positive-control, multicenter, multiple-dose, dose-escalation phase II trial

detailed_description.textblock: A randomized, positive-control, multicenter, multiple-dose, dose-escalation phase II trial. The trial was divided into 4 dose groups: the positive drug Kaishi 10 μg group and the alprostadil liposome for injection 40μg, 80μg, 120μg group.

primary_outcome.description: Change of intermittent claudication distance from baseline after 2 weeks
